TopicTitle: Any Suggestions For Good Video Maker?

Articles.Content:
I'm running for President in an 75,000-member Roblox Group, and I need a good video maker to help me create promotional videos for my campaign. I'm not looking for something complicated, just a video maker that will allow you to run animations with an background music of your choice (Just a question, can I use the KSP theme as long as I give credit?)

Do you have any suggestions for me to use?
